Split data into training and test sets

split_data.Rd

Split data into training and test sets

Usage

split_data(data, response_col = "safety", prop = 0.8)

Arguments

data

The full prepared dataset.

response_col

Name of the response column (as string).

prop

Proportion of data to include in the training set.

Value

A list with train_x, train_y, test_x, test_y.

Examples

df <- data.frame(
  feature1 = rnorm(100),
  feature2 = rnorm(100),
  safety = sample(c("low", "med", "high"), 100, replace = TRUE)
)
split <- split_data(df, response_col = "safety", prop = 0.75)
names(split)
#> [1] "train_x" "train_y" "test_x"  "test_y" 
# Returns: "train_x", "train_y", "test_x", "test_y"
